SEARCH
Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.client

Class ServerStub

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.client.ServerStub
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameController, Server, Remote
public class ServerStub extends Object implements Server, GameController
This class is used for socket communication, it receives the updates from the server through the client skeleton and forwards them to the client implementation.
